name: Power up Player 2
description:
Welcome to Power up Player 2! Made for the fifth Brackeys game jam

This game takes place in a universe with beings called "Players."

The game focuses on the adventures of Player 1 and 2.

The creatures that are known as "Players" can merge together.

What can Player 1 and 2 do other than merge? Nothing except that player 2 can fly.
A second player can join you in your adventures by downloading the file for your Makecode arcade compatible hardware here https://makecode.com/_EMKdyXJUcfzK. It also contains the source code! Or you can play with an AI by pressing [X] or (B) before playing. The source code is on GitHub. You can get there by clicking this! I guess that's it
